basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: Accounting professional with twenty years of experience in inventory and manufacturing accounting. Ability to fill in at a moment's notice, quickly mastering new systems, processes and workflows. Take charge attitude, ability to work independently, recommend and implement ideas and process improvements.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Performed general accounting functions, including account analysis, financial closings budgeting, credit memo approval, and audits. Maintained full accounting functions of 3 subsidiaries Inventory and approved all inventory transactions for all four warehouses.
highlights: Mastered new systems, processes and workflows instantly
Recommended and implemented ideas and process improvements

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Handled rollout and training of a new ERP system (Syspro), purchasing and receiving, inventory, and repair of relationships with vendors and suppliers, renegotiated payment terms.
highlights: Successfully handled responsibilities which included inventory, purchasing and work order

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Prepared documentation for audits, analyzed cost control, reconciled G/L accounts to subsidiary journals or worksheets, managed payroll, prepared financial statements, handled human resource activities, developed company's processes.
highlights: Defined, developed and streamlined company processes
Maintained MAS90 database to assure accuracy.
